full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM RIM CHEN MO SHAR SGOM BYED TSUL GYI MAN NGAG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @039B (ZHES LAM RIM SHAR SGOM BYED TSUL GYI MAN NGAG 'DI NI, RAB YID CHU SBRUL LOR BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN PA'I MNGA' BDAG 'GRO MGON GSER KHANG PA CHEN PO ^BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO DPAL BZANG POS GRO TSANG @040A *, ,DGON DU DON GNYER PA MANG POR BYANG CHUB LAM RIM CHEN MO'I GZA' BSHAD GNANG SKABS, ,MKHAS PA'I KHYU MCHOG RJE ^NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSOS ZIN BRIS SU BKOD PA NGO MTSAR BA'I LEGS BSHAD DU 'DUG NA'ANG DPE RGYUN DKON BAR BRTEN, DAM PA DE NYID KYI SKU DPON DGE SLONG BLO GROS DPAL BZANG NAS GANG CI'I MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE RAB TSES ME BYA LOR PAR DU BSGRUBS PA'O,, ,,)
